body.p: The list of selected publications, including book reviews, published in English is intended to assist accounting history researchers and those with an interest in accounting history scholarship to gain an appreciation of recent contributions to the literature. It is not intended to be an exhaustive listing and the exclusion of a publication from the list is not a reflection of the quality or potential contribution of the publication. Rather, the items listed may be viewed as indicative of the types of research conducted over the period.
